EmailTemplate.name: Introduction to MBO Patners (1380831889.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction to MBO Patners (1380831889.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Debra, When appropriate, please edit the email below and send to your client contact, making sure to CC me on the email as well. This information will introduce MBO Partners, provide our payment information and other documents, and instruct them to complete the “Independent Consultant Statement of Work” so that we capture your relevant project information. Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dear CLIENT, Thank you for the opportunity to provide support on the upcoming/specific effort. At this point in the process, I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, my contact at MBO Partners, Inc. MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses that want to engage smoothly and easily with their clients. MBO takes care of my back-office administrative support, including invoicing, collecting payments, withholding taxes, insurance coverage, and much more, so that I can stay focused on providing you with the best possible service. For more information, please refer to MBO’s one-page document <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how they work with consultants and their clients. <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on my behalf. To get everything fully initiated, please fill out and return the below form as soon as possible: - Independent Consultant Statement of Work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Independent_Consultant_Statement_of_Work.pdf>– Please complete, sign, and return Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful: - MBO Payment Information <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> - W-9 for MBO Partners <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_W-9.pdf> - Certificate of Liability Insurance <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf> If you have any questions about MBO Partners you can reach out directly to Sara Conde (copied above) at 703-793-6028 or via email at sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Debra__________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
